data.name: Jaded
data.detailed_description:
Platform and fight past spikes and enemies in Jaded, a linear 2D side-scrolling platformer. Slow down time using your 360-degree directional dash, and lock on to targets to strike! See the snowy mountains, dense forests, volcanic caves, and abandoned laboratory. Killed by enemies or spikes? Instantly respawn at the start of the room, giving you an infinite number of tries to overcome the challenge!

The Jaded beta includes Level 1, Level 2, and half of Level 3, each taking at most an hour to beat. In its current state, players can expect finished levels, music, three save files, and secret collectibles scattered across the map to discover.

Play At Your Own Pace!
Slow down time to evaluate the situation - then strike!


Or, dash your way through levels at supersonic speeds!


Fight or Flight?
Battle your way through various enemies - watch out, three hits and you’re dead!


Take in the Ambience
Travel through a multitude of environments on your journey to… do what exactly?


Stay Tuned!
Watch out for new levels, bosses, a complete story, and more in the full release of the game!

data.short_description: Platform and fight your way through mountains and forests to accomplish your purpose as a Jade being. Slow down time using your 360-degree directional dash, and lock on to targets to strike! Fight soldiers and creatures on your quest in this gem of a game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 / AMD Radeon R7 265
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 612 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: We're not entirely sure of the exact minimum specs you need to run the game. Players with significantly worse graphics cards (Nvidia GeForce 210) have experienced a game-breaking graphics glitch which turns the screen black except for the cursor, which duplicates itself. Please reach out to us on Discord if the issue occurs.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 612 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game-breaking graphics glitch has not happened on Mac to our knowledge. Reach out to us on Discord if you have any issues.
